amendment.description: Amendment sought to revoke the National Education Association's exemption from District of Columbia property taxes beginning in fiscal year 1996.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in House Report 104-302, as amendment No. 1, to revoke the National Education Association's (NEA) exemption from District property taxes beginning in FY 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonilla amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 213, 2 Present (Roll no. 758).
